param.name: labelled_path
param.displayname: Labelled data path (CSV/TXT or Feature Class)
param.dialogReference: Labelled data (CSV/TXT or Feature Class/Shapefile): Path to labelled data. Can be either a CSV or TXT file with a header row containing one label column and one or more feature columns, or a Feature Class or Shapefile with a label field and numeric attribute fields.

param.name: label_field
param.displayname: Label field name (for CSV: header column; for FC: field name)
param.dialogReference: Label field name: The name of the column or field containing class labels. For CSV or TXT files this is the header column name, and for Feature Classes this is an attribute field name.

param.name: feature_fields
param.displayname: Feature field names (comma-separated; leave empty to auto-detect)
param.dialogReference: Feature field names (comma-separated; optional): Comma-separated list of feature columns or fields to use. Leave empty to auto-detect, which will include all numeric fields except the label field.

param.name: evidence_type
param.dialogReference: Evidence source type: Choose the source of evidence data. Raster layers means a stack of raster datasets with the same size, projection, and extent. CSV or TXT vectors means a table of unlabeled feature vectors.

param.name: evidence_rasters
param.dialogReference: Evidence rasters: All rasters must have the same cell size, extent, and projection. Each raster corresponds to one feature.

param.name: evidence_vectors_file
param.dialogReference: Evidence vectors file (CSV/TXT): Path to a CSV or TXT file with feature vectors for evidence data. Each row is an unlabeled sample, and the columns are features matching the labelled dataset.

param.name: out_labelled_pairwise
param.displayname: CSV: Pairwise CSI matrix for labelled **samples**
param.dialogReference: Output CSV: Pairwise CSI matrix (labelled samples): CSV file containing pairwise cosine similarity index values between all labelled samples.

param.name: out_centroid_matrix
param.dialogReference: Output CSV: CSI matrix (class centroids): CSV file containing cosine similarity index values between class centroids.

param.name: out_evidence_table
param.displayname: CSV: CSI table for evidence vectors (when evidence is CSV/TXT)
param.dialogReference: Output CSV: Evidence CSI table (when evidence is CSV/TXT): CSV file containing CSI values for each evidence vector against class centroids. This is only required if the evidence source type is CSV or TXT vectors.

param.name: out_raster_folder
param.displayname: Folder: Output CSI rasters (one per class; when evidence is rasters)
param.dialogReference: Output folder: CSI rasters (when evidence is rasters): Output folder to store CSI rasters, one per class. This is only required if the evidence source type is raster layers.

param.name: csv_nodata
param.dialogReference: CSV/TXT NoData sentinel (numeric, optional): Optional numeric value that should be treated as NoData when reading CSV or TXT files. For example: -9999.
